title: Restoring Sessions after program start "forgets" opened connections
author: simonai1254
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
When having the option "File>Options>Startup/Exit>Reconnect to previously opened sessions on startup" enabled, the opened sessions should be opened again after closing and starting mRemoteNG.

## Current Behavior
When having the option "File>Options>Startup/Exit>Reconnect to previously opened sessions on startup" enabled, some opened sessions are forgotten and not opened again after closing and starting mRemoteNG.

I could observer missing RDP sessions, SSH sessions ar...
